title: The approach to a building from a road/street/internal means of access shall be through a paved pathway of width specified in Table 9 here-under, the length of pathway being determined by the distance from the farthest plot or building to the internal road proposed under Regulation No 23 or to an existing road from which it takes off
clause_text: The approach to a building from a road/street/internal means of access shall be through a paved pathway of width specified in Table 9 here-under, the length of pathway being determined by the distance from the farthest plot or building to the internal road proposed under Regulation No 23 or to an existing road from which it takes off.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The approach to a building from a road/street/internal means of access shall be through a paved pathway of width specified in Table 9 here-under, the length of pathway being determined by the distance
